Name: Spellcasting
Description: Can cast spells from the Druid spell list.

Name: Druidic
Description: Can speak the Druidic language and has access to the Druidic circle spells.

Name: Wild Shape
Description: Can use an action to transform into a beast that has a challenge rating of 1/4 or lower.

Name: Druid Circle
Description: Gains access to additional spells and abilities based on the chosen Druid Circle.

Name: Ability Score Improvement
Description: Can increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1.

Name: Timeless Body
Description: No longer suffers aging penalties and cannot be aged magically.

Name: Beast Spells
Description: Can cast certain spells while in Wild Shape.

Name: Archdruid
Description: Gains access to powerful abilities and spells, and can use Wild Shape to transform into a elemental.
